History of Changes

Version 2006-07 ()

1.4

  • [1.4] Donation of the resource module from the Wyona AG. This module is an alternative way of keeping resources in lenya. This code is based on https://svn.wyona.com/repos/public/lenya/modules/resource revision 15504. I did some adjustments to workaround the missing icons which cannot be included in this module due to license issues. Please submit us icons. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Re-added accidentially removed AccessControlTest Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved AC tests to modules Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added more meta data declarations Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] Split meta data config Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved meta data declaration to prepare directory Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Starting implementation of configurable meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Build process: Patch xtest file for each module separately Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] ASF Bugzilla Bug 39906 - Move Xopus integration code to a module From Jonathan Addison. Thank you. This patch moves all of the xopus files and pipelines from the core to a new xopus module. It also fixes some issues left over from migrating xopus from 1.2 to 1.4: - deleted old stylesheets - added xopus.path parameter next to xopus.context parameter in xopus.xconf (previously the pipeline had to be updated with the relative path of the xopus location) - added a basic xhtml schema (thanks to Josias) - added strip_namespaces.xsl to the xopus transformation pipeline There is a README.txt that covers what needs to be set up. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] renamed RepositoryTest to AbstractRepositoryTest because it's an abstract class Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] thanks to Jonathan Addison Neutron implementation has been finished Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] fixes for rollback usecase (define it and allow it) Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Added cleanup XSLT for homepage resource type Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Use ExistingAncestorSourceResolver for template-fallback://. This should fix bug #39959. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Renamed LDAPUserTest to Abstract... so that it isn't executed Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Merged CustomMetaDataModule and DublinCoreModule to MetaDataModule Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Advancing towards component-based meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Updated resource page layout to match default publication Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Doh! Forgot to change the package name in the module.xml to apache instead of wyona. Thanks for the headsup Andreas. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Forgot to change the id to apache instead of wyona. Thanks for the headsup Andreas. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] module cleaned and xhtml mime-type enabled Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Refactored module build process Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Activating the resource module for the default pub Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Refactored module + test build process Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Generic editing of meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Generic editing of meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Enable editing of dublin core meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moving toward configurable meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] added some javadocs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed some issues in new meta data handling, use owner.getMetaData(DublinCore.DC_NAMESPACE) instead of metaDataManager.getDublinCoreMetaData() Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added DC terms + elements to meta data config Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] fix typo Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added context to paths Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Build process: Patch xtest file for each module separately Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed authorizer configuration Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Like discussed in the dev ml, we are setting headless default to true. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] fix references to kupu module resources (for kupu editor files) Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Document and ResourceType should return Date object instead of a formatted String Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Allow to execute tests of single modules, added endorsed libraries dir to test execution Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] refine expires functionality Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Added ability to set an expires value by resource type and/or by document. Can be fetched by using the DocumentInfoModule or ResourceTypeModule in RFC 1123 date format Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] don't utilize webdav uri for content since it doesn't use existing session Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] note about bug which is causing the save problem Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] use webdav module for kupu PUT Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] note about mime-type and WYSIWYG added and save commented, because Neutron protocol doesn't allow save after checkout Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Ajax is still not working correctly in usecases. Meaning we need to set the @ajax to false. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] exclude abstract test classes from being executed, because junit fails if no tests are defined in a class. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] more meaningful samples for xhtml thanks to Renaud Richardet for the patch fixes bug 40033 Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] use tidy to clean up entities and xml from fck editor Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] replacing &ldquo; and &rdquo; during doc save Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Allow WorkflowTest to be applied to different initial states Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed some test build issues Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Made RepositoryTest abstract so it isn't executed by JUnit Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Updated test build process to work with modules correctly Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Improved XPath to check upload enabling in web.xml. This fixes bug #39976. Thanks to Oliver Schalch for the patch. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed URL reference to Kupu XSLT Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] WebDAV sitemap: fixed fallback:// URI (don't use input module and protocol together) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] WebDAV Put: enabled validation Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Replaced context:// with fallback:// so that it works with modules.copy=false Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] PublicationTemplateFallbackModule uses fallback:// source. Now it works with modules.copy=false. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added toString method to get more meaningful error messages (e.g. if a workflow event cannot be invoked). Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] added policy for logout usecase to enable the logout menu item. this is a temporary fix until we find a better solution. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] removed redundant css code: use the same css for all areas in the lenya menu. special css for certain areas is still possible using the id attribute. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] applied patch by Oliver Schalch to fix the server status tab in the admin area. fixes bug #39978 Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] minor layout adjustments: fixed vertical alignment of areas in the menubar in firefox, fixed font size of tabs in the site area in IE Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] BXE: load bxe relatively to publication to allow fallback Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] pass the usecase object to the view pipeline also for non-template uris to allow handling of usecases in a different sitemap, e.g. a module sitemap. Diff (josias)

Docs

  • [Docs] Updated meta data documentation Diff (andreas)
  • [Docs] Adding the revolution branch to the sort criteria. Diff (thorsten)
  • [Docs] Removing draft note for the project guidelines since they are official now. Diff (thorsten)
  • [Docs] fixed typo Diff (josias)
  • [Docs] Removing the fixme note since we incorporated them into the latest draft. Diff (thorsten)

Revolution

  • [Revolution] Added Edit, Link, and File Modules for editing Flat content. Still need editor for XML Resources, and the ability to create a new Resource. To use (after migrating a Publication to Flat content), browse http://server/pub/edit Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] Minor additions to the HELP. Changed some Indexes. Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] Fixing typo Diff (thorsten)

Site

  • [Site] Automatic publish from forrestbot Diff (thorsten)
  • [Site] Automatic publish from forrestbot Diff (thorsten)

Zone

  • [Zone] Removing cocoon from the nightly script since we are now using the cocoon that we deliver with lenya. Diff (thorsten)
  • [Zone] Using clean-all instead of shell commands. Diff (thorsten)
  • [Zone] Fixing spaces for the JAVA_OPTIONS Diff (thorsten)
  • [Zone] Setting the server to -Djava.awt.headless=true via the JAVA_OPTIONS env Diff (thorsten)

  • [1.4] Added lastUser and lastDate attributes to WorkflowModule, added footer to default publication which uses these attributes. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Default publication CSS: added footer support, set small font for <td> Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] BXE asset upload: user ID as creator default, creator+title+rights are optional. This fixes bug #39510. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for the patch. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] UserPasswordWithCheck: Don't try to authenticate if the user is null. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Add meta data to lucune-index.xml for xhtml resource type Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved declaration of LenyaMetaDataGenerator from default publication to core Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Build process: don't patch sitemap.xmap twice Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] code formatting Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Asset upload: creator, rights, and title are optional. The creator defaults to the user ID instead of the name. This fixes bug #39510. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for the patch. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added method to get the currently requested document to DocumentUtil Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Modified sitemap patch files so that they are not applied during each build Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed debug statements. sorry for the noise Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Issue a global redirect after a usecase is completed, otherwise the continuation will be added to the redirect. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Use separate usecase for changing password with check of old password. This avoids the security issue that the checkPassword parameter can be set by the client. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Updated usecase names in usecase-policies.xml Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Pass usecase name as parameter to usecases.js. This allows to invoke the flowscript in different ways than just using a request parameter. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Menus: check if the current document object as returned from the page envelope is really a document, because the input module logicsheet returns an empty string instead of null values. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added check for document existence to module menus to avoid exception for non-existing documents in the site area. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added sitetree entry for /concepts (en). The document exists but has to be translated. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] InsertAsset usecase: clear uload field values when upload was successful, clear file parameter value before next screen Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Asset upload: When errors occur, remove the value of the 'file' parameter. The value can't be passed to the next screen for security reasons, so the user has to be prompted to choose the asset again. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Asset upload: Completed validation, use name/id of logged-in user as default creator value, don't rely on file parameter when delegating the asset upload from the editor upload screen. This fixes bug 39510. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed unused import Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] IDE build: don't include non-existing API test directory, include modules-optional src directories Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Updated code after refactoring: DocumentIdentityMap renamed to DocumentFactory (thanks to Edith Chevrier for spotting) Diff (andreas)

Docs

  • [Docs] add sandbox and branch policies Diff (gregor)
  • [Docs] add discussion results to guidelines, add proposal for branch creation Diff (gregor)

  • [Revolution] This is (hopefully) all the changes and new files to convert 1.2.x to 1.3. There are 4 new documentation files at the root. Diff (solprovider)

  • [Revolution] Making place for the 1.2.x on which 1.3 is based on Diff (thorsten)
  • [Revolution] Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] Working on the Link ResourceType Module, I kept finding bugs in Cocoon2.1.6, so I reinstalled/reorganized my development system with Cocoon2.1.9 and a fresh copy of Lenya1.3. Fixed some bugs with Hierarchical content while testing the new installation. Updated INSTALL-SRC.txt with instructions based on new installation (especially how Cocoon's BAT files are formatted wrong.) Bug fixes for Hierarchical Content. Migrate: Use live revision for edit revision if no authoring revision (unlikely in Lenya1.2). Added Edit Module for entry into Flat Resource maintenance. Fixed Form Module's post.xsp to handle checkboxes (multiple fields with the same name). Added ResourceTransformer for changing structural information of Resources. Still being tested. Added StringSource and VirtualSourceFactory. The Cocoon project might benefit from them. VirtualSourceFactory needs to be thread-safe. Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] General cleanup and preparation for the "edit" Module (which will be delayed by the weekend.) Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] Changed index live.xconf to use "livemenu" structure. If you have previously migrated content, rename {pub}/content/index/livemenu* -> live* (overwrite the old files) Navigation Module: Fixed bug and passes to "nav" Module if flat content. Nav Module: Navigation elements for flat content. Added backwards-compatible instructions to 13UPGRADE.txt for fixing links when using the Nav Module. Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] FlatRevision: Fixed bug with getTitle() not using current revision. Migrate: Restored edit and live revisions default to "1". Migrate: Removed extension from id and fullid. This changes the content datastore, so please migrate again. Diff (solprovider)
  • [Revolution] Adding the 1.2.x branch as base for 1.3.x Diff (thorsten)
  • [Revolution] Diff (solprovider)

  • [1.2] Use the url defined in publication.xconf for the live area. It it is not set the respective input module construct the url from request parameters. Diff (jann)

  • [1.2] code simplification Diff (josias)

  • [1.4] You can now configure which resource type and extension are connected with each other via the usecase config file. That makes the PUT usecase more generic and flexible. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] enable browser-caching for static lenya images. this increases the performance e.g. of the sitetree widget and also reduces 'flickering' of the menu tabs which occurred in IE. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] ignore non-XML files Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] white noise - formating changes Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Making the mkcol usecase more abstract, allowing to define a default extension and resource type via the usecase config file. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Adding the extension again to the odt meta data like requested by michi. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] treating xml and binaries the same Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Changing access to SOURCE_URL to protected Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Extending the put.java of the webdav usecase. You can now add any file via PUT. Still there is a problem how lenya stores the final file. It uses the xml extension for all files. I tried with PUT a png and in will be saved like {name}/index_{lang}.xml. I can open it with Gimp but Lenya will fail to open the document complaining about 'Invalid byte 1 of 1-byte UTF-8 sequence.' Diff (thorsten)

Version 2006-02 ()

1.2

  • [1.2] make sure new labels are inserted before the child-nodes, so the sitetree.xml will be valid and readable more easily. Diff (josias)
  • [1.2] note about endorsed libs added Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] add support for ldap referral Diff (jann)
  • [1.2] Two same name attr for the asset library form; remove one Diff (edith)
  • [1.2] fixed and simplified copying of script elements: now works with multiple script elements. Diff (josias)
  • [1.2] fixed bug: if a node's id starts with the id of one of its siblings, it was not highlighted in the tree of the site area. Diff (josias)
  • [1.2] Showing the original path of a deleted document Diff (jann)
  • [1.2] Adding an identifier string which can be used within the trash area in order to show the original path of a deleted document Diff (jann)
  • [1.2] Add name attributes to form elements. This fixes bug #38471. Thanks to Simon Litwan for the patch. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.2] Don't swallow exception in crawler configuration Diff (andreas)
  • [1.2] Improved error logging (message, stack trace) Diff (andreas)

1.4

  • [1.4] README added Diff (michi)

  • [1.4] Moved sitemap patch files from confpatch to webapp/config/sitemap. Allow modules to patch the sitemap. This is a next step towards equal structures for core and modules. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added XLinkCollectionTest Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added ability to use dojo editor in cforms fields with dojoarea sytling like so: <ft:widget id="description"> <fi:styling type="dojoarea" rows="8" style="width:100%"> </fi:styling> </ft:widget> Diff (chestnut)

  • [1.4] Added versioning test code, fixed some bugs which popped up Diff (andreas)

  • [1.4] Fixed bug -> throw exception when publication already exists, added corresponding test Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Stop repo test on error/failure Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Saving JCR session after creating translation node (has to be continued for other operations). Without this, versioning is not possible. For transactions, the transaction capabilities of JCR have to be used. Splitting the test up into single tests. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] refactored lucene index generation: now each resource type which supports indexing must declare the format 'luceneIndex' in its configuration. This format contains a number of lucene:field elements which should contain the relevant information about the document which will be indexed. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Migrate14 imports Lenya and DublinCore meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Login to repository with user name. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Enabled to save custom meta data in the site.create usecase and added an example to the default pub. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Enhanced metadata usecase performance by adding check whether we really need to save the meta data. Further using better naming for 'public static final String's to enhance re-usability. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Renamed JCRRepositoryTest to RepositoryTest, since it's not related to JCR Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed some bugs in JCR-based repo implementation Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] removal of fallback:// from external relaxng schemas, while still utilizing fallback functionality by specifying the publication the schema is being used in Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fixed typo Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Added ability to edit custom metadata and added a small example of it to the index page. Fixed bug in the save() method that was causing an exception for nonFixedElementNames. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] formating changes Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] use an empty link attribute as default, and rewrite it using the actual link. also added missing /entries as part of the url. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] removed rss namespace according to specification, see http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/rss Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Using prefixed names for the metadata to prevent clashes in naming from dc and custom metadata Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] formating changes Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] fixed bug: if a node's id starts with the id of one of its siblings, it was not highlighted in the tree of the site area. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] changed outdated cocoon://core/modules reference to cocoon://modules and added a sitemap to handle the message.xml request. Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added ablity to call module resources while specifying the publication id Now module resources and sitemap can be referenced via: http://localhost:8888/modules/{module-id}/... or http://localhost:8888/{publication-id}/modules/{module-id}/... Both will return the same thing if accessed as an internal request. For external requests the first will always return core resources, while the second will be able to utilize the fallback capability of module-resources.xmap or {module-id}/sitemap.xmap. Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Remove references to jackrabbit from jcr module. Shut down repository properly after test is completed. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Replace AssetTypeRegistry with AssetTypeResolver Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Use JCRRepository.INTERNAL_WORKSPACE for internal publication data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] allow relativ paths for the search index to make it possible to move a publication around. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Moved repository draft and related classes to repository module Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added method URLUtil.getWebappURL(), various bugfixes in JCR-based repo implementation Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] ElementSet.getElement(): throw exception if name is not defined Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] SiteProxy.getNode(): Throw exception if site node path is not absolute Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] added docs that site node path must be absolute Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Set jcrSession field in RepositoryFacade constructor Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Return correct area ID (JCR workspace name) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added methods to obtain repository session from publication and repository from session Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed unused imports Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved method isValidDocumentName() from DocumentManager to DocumentBuilder. Allow dashes in document name in DefaultDocumentBuilder. This fixes bug #38127. Thanks for the patch by Renaud Richardet. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] gets AC Auth and AC Live tabs working Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] need to ensure that height and width attributes are present to use this module, otherwise org.apache.batik.bridge.BridgeExceptions Errors are produced Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Renamed JCR node types and names, allow Publication and Asset to have meta data Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Extended repository API (added some methods) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] fixed typo Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] added contextprefix to schema include. makes bxe work on tomcat Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Updated cocoon://core/modules/... URLs to cocoon://modules/... URLs. This is meant to fix bug #38506, no idea if it is finished yet. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] changed exclude-prefix to exclude-result-prefixes Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] fit editor to screen, use page.css Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Enabled JCR block again to make the JCRSourceNode work. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Removed handling of core/modules URLs, since it is now possible to call modules using an URL prefix. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] more docu about current JCR integration added Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] use base-url module to get the root parameter in order to get the correct urls if proxying is used. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] [minor] removed unused imports Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] [minor change] OneFormEditor: refactoring, javadocs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] SVG module: use fallback input module instead of protocol for Batik image references (Batik can't access the source resolver) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed javadoc. Thanks to Bob Harner for spotting this. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Added context prefix for cforms resources. Diff (froethenbacher)
  • [1.4] don't assume that internal links start with the context prefix. internal links should look like /pubid/area/doc-url (see also bug #31157) Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Mount module-resources.xmap with pass-through. This allows the module to serve resources if module-resources.xmap doesn't contain an appropriate pipeline. Added HTML and XHTML pipelines to module-resources.xmap. This fixes bug #38455, thanks to Simon Litwan for the patch. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Adds id attribut to form elements and name attributes to buttons. This fixes bug #38471. Thanks to Simon Litwan for the patch. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] match only on img src attributes so that it doesn't interfere other elements such as script. Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] For SVG image xlinks, use fallback input module instead of fallback protocol because Batik can't access the source resolver. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed unnecessary namespace declarations Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor] removed tabs and fixed indenting Diff (josias)

  • [1.2] more notes added Diff (michi)

  • [1.2] added default target for the tabs in the lenya menu to prevent an xhtml validation warning (attribute 'target' cannot be empty) Diff (josias)
  • [1.2] replaced deprecated library excalibur-io 1.1 by commons-io 1.1 and updated all occurrences in the java code. commons-io-1.1.jar is added to lenya because this jar is not included in cocoon 2.1.8 and older. fixes bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=38126 Diff (josias)
  • [1.2] Adding the force-checkin usecase Diff (jann)

  • [1.4] moved external linkcheck functionality to a module Diff (chestnut)

  • [1.4] Continued splitting up cocoon-xconf.xsl into dedicated xpatch files Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Use Xpatch for source factories and input modules Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved xconf files to cocoon-xconf for homepage module Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Refactored patch system for cocoon.xconf. Patch files are now gathered in build/temp/patch and not copied to the build directory. Usecase patches were removed from cocoon-xconf.xsl. I have replaced remove=... with unless=... to reduce build time, feel free to complain. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] removed jars due to licensing issues, added licenses for jetty-plus jar files Diff (chestnut)

  • [1.4] [minor change] code formatting Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] fixed a bug with create new language version if the resource type has multiple samples (only need a sample if there is no initial document). Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Instantiator deletes all previous templates before setting the template of the new publication. This fixes bug #38417. The change includes some refactoring. Updating the search index configuration is disabled, because it violates SoC by working with cocoon.xconf patch files - this doesn't work anymore since the patch files aren't copied to the build directory. Diff (andreas)

  • [1.4] Use temp/patch directory for lenya.roles patches Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Removed cocoon-xconf.xsl. This raises the issue that the Xopus context path defined in local.build.properties is not set. This will be taken care of when Xopus is moved to a module. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added option to prepare cocoon.xconf with initial patches, e.g., to add selector configurations Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed obsolete reference to scheduler logicsheet (doesn't exist anymore) Diff (andreas)

  • [1.4] Show navigation visibility on overview tab Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] GET replaced by POST Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] use fallback:// and lenya:// sources instead of ../.. Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] example external opensearch moved into lucene module Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] relative include is broken when xhtml.rng is included in other .rng schemas (try to edit and save the homepage) Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Removed System.out.println Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Modified site + admin area layout. Removed HTML tables, tabs are arranged vertically now. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added ability to have more than one script element in the head Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Removed index page from live area. This fixes bug #38380. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added menu item to switch navigation visibility Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [default pub] use meta data to display page title Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed dead code Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [BXE] Changed lenya.usecase=bxe to lenya.module=bxe for insert-link screen Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Reverted accidential commit (BXE menu item in blog publication) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added module-resources.xmap to serve module resources directly. RNG schemas are now served in a generic way, see pipeline in global-sitemap.xmap (there is still room for improvement). Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] use the correct document id in the existance-check in the case of a sibling-after relation: use the method getNewDocumentId() because it takes the relation (child, sibling-after) into account. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Fixed BXE resource paths in blog publication Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] code formatting Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor] removed invalid character Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] README refined Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Show appropriate error message if max upload size is exceeded Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added status check capabilities to UsecaseInvoker Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] code formatting Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added check for the publication id: allow no special characters Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Removed DocumentType.getMimeType(), added Document.getMimeType(). This allows different MIME types for documents of the same DocumentType (e.g., image/gif and image/jpeg for image documents). Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] thanks to Greggor Imboden the blog publication now has an archive and a lot of bugs have been fixed Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] use 24 hours date format instead of 12 hours, according to ISO-8601 Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] id tag removed Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] use standard ISO-8601 date format with two digits for the month. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Use IOUtils instead of deprecated CopyUtils. Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Fixed some character encoding problems: don't use OutputStreamWriter because it changes the encoding of the stream. Use getParameter() instead of get() for cocoon's HttpRequest class because it fixes the encoding. Changed the default uri encoding of jetty to ISO-8859-1 so it is equal to tomcats default encoding. fixes bug #36341 Diff (josias)
  • [1.4] Added isVisibleInNav() method to SiteManager. This allows to fix an NPE in the CreateLanguage usecase. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Call the svg module to scale the images Diff (edith)
  • [1.4] Added svg2tiff serializer Diff (edith)
  • [1.4] Scaling of images when they are inserted in a doc. With the call of svg module, the scaling will be made with svg. Diff (edith)
  • [1.4] Set the width and the height of the uploaded image in the lenya meta data Diff (edith)
  • [1.4] CreateDocument usecase: don't complain about non-valid document ID if the parameter documentId has been provided to the usecase Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Don't copy content when the default publication is instanciated Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Allowed @class in the object element since it is in the xhtml2 common module Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] HEAD request shouldn't contain message-body in response Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added webDAV GET format to opendocument see http://localhost:8888/default/webdav/doctypes/opendocument.odt Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Bugfix 38229. Reported and patch submitted by renaud richardet. Thx renaud. :) Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Paste usecase locks assets. This fixes bug #17378. Thanks to Gregor Imboden. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] InvokeWorkflow.configure() calls super.configure(). This ensures that the view configuration is loaded. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] webDAV fixes Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fixes Bug 38201: Deactivate usecase does not lock document resources thanks to a patch by Gregor Imboden Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fixes ability to delete trash, was getting an error that the sitetree wasn't locked Diff (chestnut)

Version 2005-09 ()

1.4

  • [1.4] opendocument module started Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Zip source added. Maybe move them into Cocoon at some later time Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Added notification module. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added CustomMetaDataModule to retrieve custom meta data. This fixes bug #36668. Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher (and sorry that I forgot to mention you in my last commit ...) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Formating changes of usecase.js. Added basic flow util js which contains io functions that can be used in the custom flow extensions. Activated the util class in the usecase.js. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Renamed publet.xconf to module.xconf Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] RollbackAction replaced with Rollback usecase Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Moved XSLT and homepage schemas to corresponding modules. This required to translate fallback:// rng includes to absolute urls (translate-rng-includes.xsl) so that they can be requested by BXE. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] new set-header ("Last-Modified") action broke site view, this fixes 36875 thanks to a patch by Josias Thoeny Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] zip factory added Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Indentation fixed fixes bug 36874 thanks to a patch by Felix Röthenbacher Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] cleaned up style-cms-page resources in sitemaps, removed serializer from style-cms-page resource, statusCode wasn't being passed to the serializer [cocoon bug?], added match for sucessful HEAD request for document [lightweight request], added "Last-Modified" header for response to sucessful request Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added template-fallback source factory (used template-fallback:// instead of template:// in the example): <quote src="http://lenya.apache.org/1_4/reference/publication-templating/index.html"> To simplify overriding of XSLT stylesheets, it would be useful to import the template stylesheet. For this purpose, an additional template source factory could be used, which skips the current publication when resolving the file: <xsl:import href="template://template/xslt/common/header.xsl"/> </quote> Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Fixes Bug 36725, Thanks to a patch by Felix Röthenbacher Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] moved match for modules above usecase match so that modules could be used in usecase views (live usecase might want to use site navigation from sitetree module) Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fallback:// proto used outside of a publication should be treated like context:// protocol (shouldn't look in non existent publications) Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fallback protocol causes problems when used outside of publication, this fix allows CreatePublicationFromTemplate usecase to work Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Use fallback proto for jx:imports so they can be overridden in templated pubs Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fix to make sample selection selected again on a subsequent screen, thanks to Andreas for pointing this out Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] typo, lenya:// should be fallback:// Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added fallback:// protocol where needed in order to override registered usecase handleing in pubs using templating Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] cleanup on rollback usecase, set exit usecase in xconf instead of jx Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] CForms dissallow id='submit' they are using now id='ok'. I extended the usecase-fw to trigger ok as well. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Added ability to have multiple samples for a module (doc type). Extra sample choices can be added by adding the sample uri to the modules module.xconf file like so (notice the extra name attribute): <sample-name>fallback://lenya/modules/xhtml/samples/xhtml.xml</sample-name> <sample-name name="Two Column Layout">fallback://lenya/modules/xhtml/samples/xhtml-2col.xml</sample-name> Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed log transformer (debug), thanks to Josias Thoeny for pointing this out Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Enhanced notification service: Added i18n for message subject. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] reverted accidential check-in Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Cocoon version updated Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] LCR updated such that new Cocoon build is being forced Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed dead code Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added DocumentComparator for sortAscending so that nested docs can be deleted Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] [minor change] setting eol-style to native for cocoon-xconf.xsl Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Applied patch for bug #36657. This fixes handling of non-fixed meta data attribute sets. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] bxe needs to add workflow version on edit Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added date, user, and ip to versions for workflow tab Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] replace ../.. with fallback protocol Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] thanks to Gregor Imboden the build.sh returns a status for further usage, e.g. automatic build testing Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] bitflux fixes Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] fixes to show versions from revision tab Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] isCheckedOutByUser method shouldn't assume that the latest entry is a checkout Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] new rollback usecase Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] can only rollback to versions with backup, only send backup entries to usecase view Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] changed checkin at the end of a rollback to make a new version if making a backup Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] added method to get backup entries from RCML-file Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] lock doc before rollback, unlock after Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Getting rid of the hardcoded path. That enables the usage of the composer in any pub that has the compilation source type. Commented out the save action, there is a bug that I am tracking since days in lenya and actually I do not know why it occurs. As workaround for the presentation I recommend to save it to the file system directly and after the presentation keep on debugging. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Applied patch for bug #36553 (API change in validation block). Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added the proxy to the generic var Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Removed custom Lenya validation code, using Cocoon validation components instead. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] thanks to a patch by Felix Röthenbacher fixes bug 36539 Diff (chestnut)
  • [1.4] Add correct URL prefix for relative schema locations. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] thanks to Gregor Imboden also meta data is being deleted Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] thanks to Gregor Imboden also the SimpleSiteManager allows deleting documents Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed jing transformer declaration Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Introduced Validator service. The JingValidator is based on Cocoon's JingTransformer (validation block) and allows to use protocols in Relax NG includes. This way, we can use fallback:// to resolve core schemas. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Default Pub: Allow resource types without custom XSLT Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] AbstractUsecase: wrap error messages in new list to avoid seeing concurrent modifications Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Simplified the cform definitions for the usecase-fw Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Enhanced *code* documentation of the generic flow object that you can use in custom flow script extensions in usecases. Alternatively one can use the invoking java class by providing bean properties methods (getter/setter methods) in this class and use them in the extensions. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] The usecase util classes are not usable ATM because of the Rhino bug Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] added an outro flowscript matcher. This way it possible to e.g. save files to the file system or do any other action when the form returns to the script. Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] [minor change] added ASF header Diff (andreas)

1.4

  • [1.4] Moved search-related files to search module. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Renamed publets to modules Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added lenyadoc:// protocol publet. This fixes bug #36360. Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Add JCR workspace file to source. This fixes bug #36334. Credits to Felix Roethenbacher. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added usecase GUI manager to allow dynamic assembly of tabs in admin and site environments. This will allow to register new tabs by modules using XPatch files. Furthermore, tabs are now displayed / hidden based on access rights and executability, similar to the menubar. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added usecase for JCR import+export (see bug #36273). Credits to Felix Roethenbacher. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Update usecase configurations and handler classes (Transactionable -> Node) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added JCR classes to publet Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved JCR repo to separate publet Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed obsolete workflow classes Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved search-related files to search module. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Refactored usecases config. Background information http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=112380230800004&r=1&w=2 Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Use path from context://lenya in usecase view template URIs. This allows to provide usecase views by publets. The JCR import usecase view was moved to the JCR publet. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Changed JCR repository location Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Removed JCR classes (moved to publet) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Fixed the cform integration. I needed to switch the position of the binding to make it possible to load values into the form Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.4] Avoid NPE when DocumentHelper passes DTD information to the transformer. This fixes bug #36419. Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Removed workflow situation. The situation information is now implicitely provided by the workflowable object. This allows to get rid of WorkflowManager.getSituation(), which required it to be Contextualizable (which fails with pooling). Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] thanks to Gregor Imboden the one form editor is able to save again Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Store parametersInitialized as parameter to avoid re-initialization when UsecaseProxy accesses getTParameterNames() Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] DocumentStore: Fixed order of arguments of DocumentIdentifier ctor. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Performance: added workflow schema cache Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Performance: Attach page envelope to request, lazy loading for usecase parameters Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] cleaned up document builder code to use URLInformation, simplified WorkflowMenuTransformer code Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Removed non-url methods from usecase resolver. This way, it doesn't have to be Contextualizable and can be ThreadSafe (performance issue) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] code cleanup, javadoc fixes Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] simplified code, removed accidentially committed error log Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Refactored repository session handling. Switched from PublicationFactory to PublicationManager Avalon service. Add DocumentIdentifier to reduce document handling costs. This generates a performance improvement. Diff (andreas)

  • [1.4] Renamed publets to modules. Diff (andreas)

1.2

  • [1.2] Bugfix 35356 Submitted by Simon Litwan. Thx Simon Litwan Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.2] Delete temp cocoon.xconf patch file on exit. This avoids that the build cancels under Windows when a file locking error occurs. The temp file won't be deleted in this case, so there's still room for improvement. Bug: http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35394, Patch supplied by Jan Metzner. Thanks! Diff (andreas)

  • [1.2] Explicitly set utf-8 as the charset. This should hopefully resolve the remaining UTF-8 problems. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] set the encoding in the email header Diff (edith)

Version 2005-05 ()

  • [] Tagging release 1.2.3 Diff (gregor)

1.2

  • [1.2] added ProxyUrlModule (Bug #33742), credits to Felix Roethenbacher Diff (andreas)
  • [1.2] Added CIFSUser implementation by Doug Chestnut and Peter Shipley. This allows to authenticate users against CIFS using JCIFS. Lenya ships with a mock jar, replace with the real thing if you want to use this. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=27289 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Added CIFSUser implementation by Doug Chestnut and Peter Shipley. This allows to authenticate users against CIFS using JCIFS. Lenya ships with a mock jar, replace with the real thing if you want to use this. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=27289 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Added anonymous authenticator (useful for client certs) based on work by Mike Moretti. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=34253 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Updated russian translation by Антон Коваленко. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=34798 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Added russian translation by Anton Kovalenko Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Re-commit japanese translations in an effort to preseve UTF-8 encoding Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] apply patch for bug #35062 (strange characters in textarea-fields in IE), credits to Simon Litwan Diff (andreas)
  • [1.2] Xopus pipeline view added in order to allow better debugging and illustrating how Xopus needs to be attached Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] commit patch for bug #35041 (no german translations for errors in addUser GUI), credits to Simon Litwan Diff (andreas)
  • [1.2] Updated the russian translation. Thanks to qMax Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] No longer emit debug messages when starting lenya on windows Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Properly escape warnings in validation.js This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35022 Diff (gregor)

  • [1.2] Optimized copying of files to WEB-INF/classes Diff (gregor)

  • [1.2] Improved russian translation. Thanks to qMax Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Fixed the links to the documentation Diff (thorsten)
  • [1.2] thanks to Simon Litwan the problem with slashes has been fixed Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] patch 15061 applied Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] Set serializer for static publishing to XHTML. Thanks to Travis McCauley. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] generate a warning if no parentid request parameter has been specified and obsolete method name from log message removed Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] Honour doctype in site area for menu generation. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=34890 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Backported CSS/XHTML menu from trunk, and switched to XHTML serialization everywhere. Lenya now validates as XHTML 1.0 strict. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Made sure that linefeeds in batch files are windows-style. Thanks to Paul Ercolino for the hint. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Added missing i18n declaration to password xsl. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=34911 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] error handling and warnings improved Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] invalidate session added Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] Translated a couple stragglers in the admin UI, thanks to solprovider. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Start to use labels for accessibility Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Translated 'document visible in navigation' Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Made sure that URI strings are properly encoded when calling the URI default constructor. This resolves the long-standing issue http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=27558 where Lenya could not be installed in a directory with spaces in the path. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Made access control classes serializable based on a patch by Mirek Hankus. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=34127 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] logout activated Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] version updated Diff (michi)
  • [1.2] Use Ant task to fix CRLF for the shell scripts and make them executable Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Explicitly exclude build directories from dist-src target Diff (gregor)

  • [1.4] Introduced lightweigt repository layer using RepositorySource which is resolved by the lenya:// protocol. This allows transparent transaction handling in the source layer. The implementation is currently done using context:// sources, this can be changed to JCR later on. Diff (andreas)

  • [1.4] language added in order to show how the language can also be used within the global layout Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed unused method Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed dead code Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] unit of work: synchronize commit() and rollback() because changes to sources are made Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added mime-type, lastmodified, contentlength to repo sources and assets Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] DefaultSiteTree: don't use source's DOM document Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] removed 'usebuffer=false' (accidential check-in) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] changed index from i to j in inner loop - I assume this was a typo Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] using Resource objects in asset mgmt screen Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] generalized DublinCore to MetaDataManager, using lenya:// sources for asset management Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added support for non-XML repository sources Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] enabled using logger in DefaultDocument Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed no longer existing actions, HTMLFormSaveAction and OneFormEditorSaveAction, so they are not added to sitemap Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] use request attribute instead of session attribute to store UnitOfWork Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] use already available publication instead of lookup Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] usecases.js: allow usecase to rollback the transition if an exception was thrown in the flowscript Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] check for site manager hint != null in DefaultDocument.exists() Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] AbstractUsecase: moved commit/rollback to finally clause Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] set svn:keywords for Id on future commits Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] [minor change] added some debug log messages and documentation Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] allow to cancel usecases incl. rollback of the transition, which means that objects are checked in when a usecase uses pessimistic offline lock Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed reference to UnitOfWork.ROLE Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed reference to non-existent default.css Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] UnitOfWork is no longer a service -> do not release it through service manager Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] [minor change] added debug message at entry of usecase flow, to facilitate tracing Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] unit of work: check in all involved resources, not only the changed ones Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] using revision controller to determine if source node is checked out Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added functionality to support pessimistic offline lock, fixed RCML path resolving for SourceNodes Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Changed shorthand for ResourceNotFound exception to not-found to make error pipelines work again. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Moved XSPPrecompileWrapper to test sources Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] usecases throw exception in advance() Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] add exception to Usecase.advance() Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] replace admin.xmap by usecases/admin/usecase.xmap Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Using usecase handler for BXE usecase. This allows transaction handling. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added parameterization for usecases Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] refactored site management, fixed delete usecase problems Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Use byte array instead of separate thread to convert DOM to input stream. This avoids the 'pipe closed' exception. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] disable 'empty trash' when trash is empty Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] display site area tab properly Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] use full page width for admin usecase tabs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] added tab JX import to addGroup JX template Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] locking added to ChangeLabel usecase Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] proper locking when a document is moved or links are rewritten Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Using lenya:// protocol in parameter-doctype.xmap. This way, the resource type is correctly resolved in transactions, even if the real source of a document is not yet created. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] {page-envelope:area} returns complete area instead of document area Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Introduced interfaces Versionable, Lockable, and Identifiable. This makes it easier to add the appropriate functionality to a class. Furthermore, a bug re. recursive deactivation was fixed. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Publish recursively: Don't publish a document if it's parent is not published Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added locking to InvokeWorkflow usecase Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added locking to create uscases Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] replaced System.out by getLogger().debug Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] set Id for svn back as it was - sorry about that Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] [minor change] set cocoon-version to 2.1.7 Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] [minor change] corrected XML syntax Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] Temporary fix for bug 34175 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Introduced lightweigt repository layer using RepositorySource which is resolved by the lenya:// protocol. This allows transparent transaction handling in the source layer. The implementation is currently done using context:// sources, this can be changed to JCR later on. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Reverted move of menus to core (the menu is specific to the default publication) Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Removed scheduler logicsheet Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Do not return an array of AbstractRole to enable implementations not derived from AbstractRole. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=34290 Thanks to Joachim Breitsprecher. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] use document area for meta data instead of usecase area Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] removed unit of work from cocoon.xconf Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] create build dir by default such that build process does not fail unnecessarily Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] in finally block, check if services are not null Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Javadoc added about the link parameter Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] enabled transactions for workflow history Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] resolve latest RC versions correctly Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] avoid NPE when calling TreeSiteManager methods for non-existing tree nodes Diff (andreas)

  • [1.4] Added a default CMS menu locale and a default document locale to the user profile Diff (tschlabach)
  • [1.4] Don't copy core Java sources to build.src. This saves another 500 unnecessary copies, and maybe 3 seconds. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Switched build to precompiled ant tasks. This shaves another unnecessary 3 seconds off the build. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Changed build to directly compile to WEB-INF/classes instead of to a temporary location. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Moved more properties to properties-build, enabled javac optimization Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Made sure that excludes are actually working while copying cocoon files. This resolves the problem where the Lenya db was not copied correctly. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] [minor change] changed to lazy loading of unit-of-work, as was done in usecase framework Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] [optimization] UsecaseRegistrationMatcher checks if lenya.usecase parameter is set before calling resolver. Further, it is now marked as poolable, thus less service creations occur Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] Added a default CMS menu locale and a default document locale to the User object. Diff (tschlabach)
  • [1.4] [minor change] in operations, retrieval of unit-of-work now is lazy. It can thus throw an exception, this is explicitly declared in the interface, for higher transparency Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] release use case component after usage (does not solve the case where user never completes second step in interactive use cases) Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] Pass the ServiceManager to tasks and Ant tasks. This made it possible to remove deprecated workflow support classes. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] template managment moved to Publication, lazy loading for PageEnvelope fields Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added java-docs Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] Replaced PublicationFactory.existsPublication() by Publication.exists(). This way, all PublicationFactory.getPublication() methods can be used to check if a publication exits. The change was possible because of the publication config lazy loading. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] removed obsolete (Request, webappUrl) methods from AccessController and Authorizer Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] removed unused imports Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] lazy loading for PublicationImpl configuration Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] fixed pipeline order (sorry for messing this up before) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added strip namespaces transformation to BXE open step Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Sychronized all methods in DefaultSiteTree. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33908 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Changed occurence of document-node-id to document-name Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Removed info messages from build and put it into comments in the build file instead. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] added first version of GUI to create a publication Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] improved UnitOfWork javadocs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added debug messages Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] DocumentManager instance is now not created for every case, only upon request in getDocumentManager(). This method can now throw an exception, so methods explicitly listing exceptions as in ChangeNodeID.java must reflect this. Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] don't use page envelope in usecase flowscript Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added method to publication factory to return all available publications Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] usecase resolver works now for non-publication URLs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] fallback source factory works now for non-publication URLs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Moved config/menus/generic.xsp from publication to core lenya/cmsmenus.xsp Diff (tschlabach)
  • [1.4] put scheduler declaration at the end, this way the HSQL DB server has started up when the scheduler needs the job store Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] enable hsqldb block for scheduler job persistence Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] scheduler: use custom keep-alive statement because HSQL cannot parse 'SELECT 1' Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] updated to new DocumentFactory method signature Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] introduced UsecaseScheduler Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] introduced UsecaseScheduler Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] [minor change] refactoring: extracted method Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] reverted some changes due to improvements in usecase cron job Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] usecase cron job initializes request in object model with original URL Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] don't use publication templating for content sources Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] uri parameterizer: pass publication ID as parameter to fallback module (allows to use it from scheduler) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] allow to pass publication ID as parameter to fallback module Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] UsecaseCronJob initializes access control information in session -> workflow invocation works in scheduled usecases Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] added methods to authorize a request with a custom URL Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] CMSSituation: made toString() more verbose Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] don't check for scheduling request parameter (obsolete) in usecase flowscript Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] enable scheduling for publish usecase (doesn't work yet due to missing AC role initialization) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] initialize workflow situation even if no session is present Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] obtain publication from document instead of object model Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] don't use request to resolve invocation URL Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] refactored usecase initialization (source URL is passed and not resolved via context) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] removed publication from document identity map (conceptually incorrect) Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Added default value for rendertype variable Diff (tschlabach)
  • [1.4] Finally fixed encoding ... sorry! Diff (tschlabach)
  • [1.4] Applied some formatting and fixed encoding to UTF-8 (see bug #28448) Diff (tschlabach)
  • [1.4] minor change: log error message Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] moved message output to dedicated JX template Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] changing css class references from lenya-form-entry to lenya-form-element, as this is what is available in the css file Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] fix to avoid NPE in logging when new user is added and then used for log in. Note: this is a quick fix, a restructuring of the Item hierarchy might be necessary to avoid these problems, see discussion on dev list Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] removed spaces within textarea element to avoid problems in description field Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] remove spaces in textarea element. Correct password typo Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] Redesign of workflow handling. The workflow core is reduced to a mere engine, the history handling is done by Workflowable now. This way, the workflow persistence could be moved to the Document classes, which means that repository access and transaction handling can easily be supported. Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] save changes to user Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] call new use-case for "change group memberships" Diff (jwkaltz)
  • [1.4] call save() after changes Diff (jwkaltz)

1.2

  • [1.2] Renamed libraries to have their version in the name Diff (gregor)

  • [1.2] Added empty tasks log directory to make view-logs usecase work Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Added empty tasks log directory to make view-logs usecase work Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] versions updated Diff (michi)

  • [1.2] Made sitetree methods synchronized to guard against concurrent writes Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Fixed NPE reported by Phillipp Bolle Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Made forms editor scroll to editing position after pressing "edit". This fixes http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33731 (Thanks to Thomas Comiotto for the patch) Diff (gregor)
  • [1.2] Create WEB-INF\logs on unpacking of the war file. Otherwise we get erros on console upon start up. The ant jar task does not include empty dirs. Diff (roku)
  • [1.2] Proper fix for http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33225 Diff (gregor)

  • [1.4] check if URL represents document before resolving workflow Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] don't apply WF transformation for non-document URLs Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] isDocument = false for admin area Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Merged from 1.2.x: Useability fix: Only display tab as link, if tab if not the current nav:node Diff (roku)
  • [1.4] Added a ConsoleLogger() to make test cases run again Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Switched to BXE 1.1 and Kupu 1.2 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Started to use the (much more recent) Quartz from the Cocoon cron block in lieu of the library we shipped before. Our version did not implement methods that some of our code was expecting. Also fixed the scheduler XSP to get past compilation errors. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Changed string concatenation to use a StringBuffer Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Fixed Eclipse warnings Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Fixed resource leaks with not properly closing Streams Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Made exceptions final Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Made exceptions final Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Fixed resource leaks with not properly closing Streams Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Removed unneeded Log4J Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Fixed Eclipse warnings Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Replaced deprecated tokenStream(Reader) with tokenStream(String, Reader) Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Cleaned up Eclipse warnings Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Made insert link popup work again by switching to XHTML serialization. Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Added the workflow menu transformer to the blog publication Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Added a single-step workflow definition to the blog publication Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Changed enum variables to improve compatibility with JDK 1.5 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] check if current URL represents a document before calling setDocument() Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Made images and asset titles visible in the forms editor. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=29139 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] thanks to Josias Thoeny XMLHTTP has been implemented for the sitetree of the default publication Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Made anonymous classes final inner classes Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Added svn properties Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Cleaned up source code to deal with Eclipse warnings and Findbug reports. This adds javadocs to all public methods, fixes some resource leaks (Findbugs term: OS), replaces string concatenation with StringBuffer (SBSC), avoids catch (Exception e) (REC), avoids hiding of internal variables by parameter names, makes variable access explicit, and uses entrySet instead of keySet (WMI). Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Use XML serializer for XHTML until Xalan doctype problems are resolved. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33431 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Removed label attribute from menu (no longer needed) Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Updated the blog menus to use uc attributes and I18n. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=27832 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Removed dead code Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Fix dubious code to use a locale for toUpperCase / toLowerCase methods Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Added a note on proxy configuration to publication.xconf Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Enabled roundtripping of images between BXE and Kupu. Note that this change requires at least Kupu revision 8795 to work. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=29164 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Removed xlink tranformer definition Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] If the current sitree node does not exist in the displayed document's language Continue with next node. This is a quick fix for bug #32808. Next step would be to offer all links to the available languages. Diff (roku)
  • [1.4] Replaced ASL 1.1 with ASL 2.0 and set svn properties Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Improved sample documents in the default publication with metadata. Diff (gregor)

1.4

  • [1.4] added some publication utility classes Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] add publish usecase handler for default pub Diff (andreas)
  • [1.4] Replaced the Lenya menu with a standards-based implementation by Jon Linczak. New features: * It is now possible to have more (or less) than 4 menus * The area tabs are now internationalized * The new menu displays properly with serialization set to XHTML * The menu javascript code is now far more robust (and simpler) * Area tabs now have a hover effect * Accessibility is improved (by doing away with tables for the menu, and using lists) This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33024 Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] Re-added Xlink and XPath classes that slipped into the XPS removal. Diff (gregor)

  • [1.4] gurit added to live sites Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] change the navigation framework to create absolute links including the host and protocol if SSL is enabled anywhere in a publication. this is necessary to make navigating between SSL and non SSL pages of a site possible (without a protocol it is not possible to distinguish otherwise) if you have problems with your links through a proxy, consider using the live mount prefix. this will rewrite links in your live area to the form /livemountprefix/documentid/. use / as livemountprefix for virtual hosts (it willl rewrite lenya/yourpub/authoring/index.html yousite.com/index.html and so on) yeah i know this needs more documentation :) Diff (gregor)

Version 2004-03 ()

1.4

  • [1.4] Moved i18n handling to a separate sitemap in order to: - avoid potential endless loops caused by sub sitemap mounts - avoid unessacarry ResourceBundle loggings in core.log if a dict file is not found Diff (roku)
  • [1.4] the eclipse-project target is now able to create an eclipse project for lenya. some new properties in build.properties: cocoon.dir ide.eclipse.outputdir ide.eclipse.export.libs Diff (gregor)
  • [1.4] logging for shell scripts and batch files Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] UploadHelper added Diff (michi)
  • [1.4] Added pub local i18n catalogue files. Diff (roku)
  • [1.4] Merges pub local i18n catalogue with global i18n catalogue. Diff (roku)
  • [1.4] Used to merge pub local message catalogue with global one. Diff (roku)
  • [1.4] Added a new use step in the publish usecase named "show-referenced-documents" which allows you to download the list of referenced documents as a text/plain file. Diff (egli)
  • [1.4] Search is now handled in a separate xsl. Diff (egli)
  • [1.4] pre-populate lucene index for authoring area as well. michi, please update both indexes before release #26945 Diff (gregor)

  • [1.4] missing resource PR: Obtained from: Submitted by: Reviewed by: CVS: ---------------------------------------------------------------------- CVS: PR: CVS: If this change addresses a PR in the problem report tracking CVS: database, then enter the PR number(s) here. CVS: Obtained from: CVS: If this change has been taken from another system, such as NCSA, CVS: then name the system in this line, otherwise delete it. CVS: Submitted by: CVS: If this code has been contributed to Apache by someone else; i.e., CVS: they sent us a patch or a new module, then include their name/email CVS: address here. If this is your work then delete this line. CVS: Reviewed by: CVS: If we are doing pre-commit code reviews and someone else has CVS: reviewed your changes, include their name(s) here. CVS: If you have not had it reviewed then delete this line. Diff (gregor)

  • [1.4] first cut of SSL support. the SimpleLinkTransformer now checks if a link is protected by SSL (has the SSL property set in its policy) and prepends a SSL prefix. this allows you to selectively serve pages of your site through SSL. i'll write some documentation to outline the setup with mod_proxy and friends.   • [1.4] Fixed a bug that shows up in some corner cases: When deactivating a document the references used to be checked in a language agnostic way, i.e. you would get warnings that were not true. This is fixed so that the document bar [en] only invokes a warning when deactivating iff 1. the link is to bar_en 2. or the link is to bar and en is the default language. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Added a note about the fact that you have to use the local.*.properties from ./src/cocoon to build your cocoon. Otherwise you'll get problems with the cron block. This fixes #24738. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Merged some usability fixes from the unicom pub over: * requred fields * note about allowed values * warning about duplicate document-ids Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Added a warning in the screen that no special chars are allowed when renaming a document ( a '/' in the new document-id will lead to an exception). This is a workaround for bug #24610 which is non-trivial to fix and will therefore be punted to 1.4 Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] using DOMSource and DocumentBuilder with EntityResolver to avoid external HTTP lookup Diff (andreas)
  • [1.0] checking if visitor role exists Diff (andreas)
  • [1.0] Added dcterms to exclude-result-prefixes so that it is no longer that zealous with namespaces. Fixes #24618 Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Adapted the tutorial to the new menu structure and added a user alice as an reviewer. This will give a nice balance as we have a man (lenya) doing the authoring and a woman doing the reviewing. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Remove the scheduler menu entry from the Help section since the functionality is now in the scheduler tab in the site area and since a click on the menu causes an exception. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] The publishing usecase now uses the fallback module to find the xslt. This allows for publication specific publishing xslts. This is used e.g. in the bloging pub to remove the scheduling parts of the screen. Fixes #24857 Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Adapted a relative path to make sure it also works in the context of a publication. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Moved the one-form editor to a separate pipeline so we can do specific error handling for it. The sax-parsing exception (that can occur if you enter non-validating xml in the one-form editor) is now handled and a nice error screen is rendered. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Replace "/home/username" by "$HOME" and "username" by "$USER". Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Removed the obsolete usecase upload (which is only used in unipublic), updated the usecase docu and updated the default pub to refer to the asset upload usecase. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Added more docu to the FIXME: Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Link Management now assumes that internal links are of the form href="http://$SERVER_NAME:$SERVER_PORT/$CONTEXT_PREFIX/$PUBLICATION_ID/$AREA$DOCUMENT_ID(_[a-z][a-z])?.html If there is a match in a document file it is assumed that this is an internal link and is treated as such (warning if publish with unpublished internal links and warning if deactivate with internal references). However this is not coordinated with the DocumentToPathMapper and will probably fail if the URL looks different. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Instead of having a boolean variable 'insertBefore' there is now a variable 'insertWhere' which can be 'before', 'after' or 'inside'. For the values 'before' and 'after' the tags are added before or after the original tag. For the value inside the new tag is inserted inside the original tag. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Instead of having a boolean variable 'insertBefore' there is now a variable 'insertWhere' which can be 'before', 'after' or 'inside'. This variable is passed to the ant task which acts accordingly. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] The Dublin Core class has been rewritten to make proper use of the GoF Proxy Pattern. The old 'clever' algorithm had severe timing flaws, whereas the new algorithm is based on tried and proven technology. So the DublinCore class has been transformed into an interface, a proxy and an actual implementation which is used by the proxy. Diff (egli)

Version 2003-07 ()

1.0

  • [1.0] initial checkin of access control documentation Diff (andreas)
  • [1.0] - removed old access control actions - added ac.xconf and authoring policy (using accreditables from default publication) Diff (andreas)

  • [1.0] ant task to set in the project the area properties dependent of the area Diff (edith)
  • [1.0] Task delete Trash Diff (edith)

  • [1.0] Make sure the handle-errors contains a serialize so that exception stack traces are shown. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Image upload for uni public works again. The following changes had to be applied: The sitemap path was not pointing at the publication sitemap anymore since the usecase stuff has been moved to the root sitemap. So the PageEnvelope is used to find the publication directory. In the olden days (when uni public was created) the document-id used to contain the suffix of the document as well. This is no longer the case, so the image upload had to be adjusted. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Fixed some code layout problems. CVS: ---------------------------------------------------------------------- CVS: PR: CVS: If this change addresses a PR in the problem report tracking CVS: database, then enter the PR number(s) here. CVS: Obtained from: CVS: If this change has been taken from another system, such as NCSA, CVS: then name the system in this line, otherwise delete it. CVS: Submitted by: CVS: If this code has been contributed to Apache by someone else; i.e., CVS: they sent us a patch or a new module, then include their name/email CVS: address here. If this is your work then delete this line. CVS: Reviewed by: CVS: If we are doing pre-commit code reviews and someone else has CVS: reviewed your changes, include their name(s) here. CVS: If you have not had it reviewed then delete this line. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Removed the usage of util.xsl as it didn't work when invoked from the global sitemap. Use the PageEnvelope input module instead. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] added bxe extensions to schema Diff (gregor)
  • [1.0] * Simplified the publish pipeline by using the request: and the request-param: input modules. * Added a very simple handle-errors to the **.html pipeline which gives you a crude window suggesting that you might not have published the document. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] url info added to default envelope Diff (michi)
  • [1.0] The XML files in content are now stored according to the following scheme foo.html is stored in foo/index.xml, i.e. for each document a directory is created. This has the following implications: The xmlSources for publishing have to be calculated differently: replace "\\.html" in the xsp_lenya_pub_url by File.separator + "index.xml". Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] make sure the publishing task doesn't fail if resources/images/authoring doesn't exist. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] The XML files in content are now stored according to the following scheme foo.html is stored in foo/index.xml, i.e. for each document a directory is created. This has the following implications: 1. The content files themselves are moved from content/authoring/*.xml to content/authoring/*/index.xml. 2. The doctype sitemap now generates the content from {document-id}/index.xml. 3. The parameter-doctype.xmap checks the file in {document-id}/index.xml for its doctype. 4. The creator now uses the BranchCreator instead of the LeafCreator. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Fixed a bug in Ediths checkin where she had placed the comments wrong. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] The check whether a node already exists did not work. Using the new method getAbsoluteParentId it is fixed now. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Added a new method getAbsoluteParentId which returns the entire parentId. This is used for inerting nodes into the sitetree where we have to specify the whole parentid. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Thanks to the fact that it is now possible to use constructs like {request:requestURI} in the sitemap and thanks to the fact that the requestURI for a creation request contains the URL of the requesting document we no longer need to put the referer into the session. When the creation was successful we simply redirect back to the requestURI. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] The parenturi is normaly calculated through the PageEnvelope in the util logicsheet. However I now added the possibility to override this with a request parameter. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Added some more heuristics to the computation of the document-id: if the requestURI ends in "index" chop it of. Diff (egli)

  • [1.0] Mailing lists updated Diff (michi)
  • [1.0] added namespace for root matcher <apply-templates> Diff (andreas)
  • [1.0] email as element instead as attribute Diff (michi)
  • [1.0] According to the uri scheme standard the request parameters for usecase and step are named "lenya.usecase" and "lenya.step". This is now corrected for all publications and in the root sitemap. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] HTML editor comparison removed Diff (michi)
  • [1.0] introduction updated Diff (michi)
  • [1.0] Programming Language added to Schema Diff (michi)
  • [1.0] The util.xsl now uses the PageEnvelope class the get most of its information. It could be cleaned up very much now. There are new tags that it'll recognize now. They are based on the naming for the URI scheme: xsp-lenya:context-prefix xsp-lenya:publication-id xsp-lenya:area xsp-lenya:document-id All the other stuffshould be deprecated. Diff (egli)
  • [1.0] Added code to return the document-id. The algorithm to calculate the document-id is based on an assumption which doesn't necessarily hold true under all circumstances. That's what the uriparametrizer was meant to solve. This code should probably be used here. It just doen's feel right to invoke another cocoon: request with every invocation of PageEnvelope (and util.xsl). Diff (egli)
